calculations.name: Pre Month Value - Up
calculations.tableau_expression: if [Pre Month Value - YoY] > 0 then '↑' else '' END

calculation_context.Expression: if [Pre Month Value - YoY] > 0 then '↑' else '' END

calculated_fields.Pre Month Value - YoY: ([Pre Month Value] - [Pre Month Value - Last Year])/[Pre Month Value - Last Year]
calculated_fields.Pre Month Value:
{ sum(if [Order Date] >= [First Date Pre Month]
        and [Order Date] < DATETRUNC('month',[Max Date]) 
        then     [Measure Selector] end) 
}
calculated_fields.Pre Month Value - Last Year:
{ sum(if [Order Date] >= [First Date Pre Month - Last Year]
        and [Order Date] < dateadd('year',-1,DATETRUNC('month',[Max Date]))
        then     [Measure Selector] end) 
}
calculated_fields.Measure Selector:
case [Parameters].[Measure Selector Param]
    when 'Profit' then [Profit]
    when 'Sales' then [Sales]
END
